nodes.text: Loop juice was a type of juice that, according to the smuggler Han Solo, was fermented at high gravity in satellites orbiting black holes up and down the Kessel Run. Whilst trying to get a drink in a mess hall in the Mako-Ta Base, Solo told Chewbacca that he had heard that Admiral Ackbar had gotten hold of a container of loop juice whilst also telling Luke Skywalker that he should try it.
